Articles.Content:
I have just started a Apollo 13 project with some mods. The mods i am using are Sunday Punch NACA left and Right high performance wings.

Only problem i am haveing is the 2metre FLs2000 fuel tank keeps exploding every so often!!! anyone with suggestions are welcome to give ideas
Sorry to be no help but the fact that a tank is exploding on an Apollo 13 recreation is just too much appropriate misfortune not not remark on!

Help?

You\'ve successfully recreated Apollo 13. Mission accomplished bro.
really?? it looks like Apollo 13 but doesnt fly like Apollo 13!!!!
